hoatChat: Omeprazol (dưới dạng vi hạt tan trong ruột chứa 8,5% omeprazol)
dongGoi: Hộp 3 vỉ x 10 viên; hộp 3 vỉ x 8 viên; chai 500 viên; chai 1000 viên
taDuoc: Mannitol, Hydroxy propyl methyl cellulose (HPMC - E5),  Methacrylic acid copolymer, Sodium lauryl sulfat, Di sodium hydrogen ortho phosphat, Sucrose, Titanium dioxid, Poly vinyl pyrrolidone K-30, Calcium carbonat, Talc, Di ethyl phthalat,  Polysorbat 80,  Sodium hydroxid, Sodium methyl paraben, Sodium propyl paraben
